personalInfo.name: Zulfikar Rosadi
personalInfo.title: Full-Stack Web Developer
personalInfo.summary: A passionate and creative full-stack developer with a knack for building beautiful, functional, and user-centric web applications. With over 5 years of experience, I specialize in modern JavaScript frameworks like Svelte and React, and I'm always eager to learn new technologies.

responsibilities: Led the development of a new customer-facing dashboard using SvelteKit, resulting in a 20% increase in user engagement.
Mentored junior developers and conducted code reviews to ensure high-quality code.
Collaborated with UI/UX designers to translate wireframes into pixel-perfect, responsive web pages.
Developed and maintained server-side APIs using Node.js and Express.
Built and styled reusable components with React and Styled Components.
Managed database schemas and queries using PostgreSQL.

projects.title: E-commerce Platform
projects.description: A fully-featured e-commerce website with product listings, a shopping cart, and a secure checkout process. Built with SvelteKit and integrated with Stripe for payments.

projects.title: Real-time Chat Application
projects.description: A web-based chat application that allows users to communicate in real-time. Features include user authentication, private messaging, and group channels.

projects.title: Data Visualization Dashboard
projects.description: An interactive dashboard for visualizing complex datasets. Used D3.js to create dynamic and responsive charts and graphs.

education.name: University of Technology
education.title: B.Sc. in Computer Science
details: Graduated with honors, focusing on web development and algorithms.
Active member and later president of the university's competitive programming club.

education.name: Svelte Community
education.title: Open Source Contributor
details: Actively contribute to SvelteKit documentation, clarifying complex topics for new users.
Help triage and reproduce issues on the official GitHub repository to accelerate bug fixes.

education.name: Codecademy
education.title: Data Science Path
details: Completed modules on Python, Pandas, Matplotlib, and Scikit-learn.
Finished a capstone project on analyzing public health data.
